mapper.select: select userId,userName,password,flag from bguser where userName=#{userName} and password=#{password}
SELECT username,password,name as role FROM bguser u LEFT JOIN role r ON u.roleId = r.id WHERE username = #{username}
SELECT r.id,r.name,r.pid,r.api from resource r,role_resource rs where r.id=rs.resource_id and role_id=#{id}
select userId, username,password,sex,birthday,phone,email,create_time,r.duty as role,flag from bguser b, role r where b.roleId=r.id and username like concat('%',#{username},'%')
mapper.update: update bguser set flag = #{flag} where userId=#{id}
